name: Money Laundering Patterns
description: Techniques used to track and prevent the illegal movement of funds.

cards.title: Structuring and Smurfing Detection
cards.description: Identifying small, structured transactions used to launder money.
bulletpoints: Monitor cash deposits below reporting thresholds
Identify multiple accounts linked to the same entity
Analyze transaction frequency and timing for laundering indicators

cards.title: Cryptocurrency Money Laundering
cards.description: Investigating illicit financial activity within blockchain transactions.
bulletpoints: Track cryptocurrency wallets linked to illicit activities
Analyze blockchain transactions for laundering patterns
Use forensic tools to trace funds across multiple exchanges
